titles.title: HP380 Come workers of the lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, workers of the Lord,
And lift up heart and hand;
Praise God, all skill at bench and board,
Praise, all that brain has planned.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When Christ to manhood came,
A craftsman was he made,
And served his glad apprentice-time
Bound by the joiner's trade.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When Christ on Calvary
Drank down his cruel draft,
The men who made the fatal tree
Were men of his own craft.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So, God, our labour take,
From spite and greed set free;
May nothing that we do or make
Bring ill to man or thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
All workers for the Lord,
Come sing with voice and heart;
In strength of hands be God adored,
And praised in power of art.
